name: Renascence (ALPHA 1 DEMO)
description:
This is a proof of concept demo, everything is subject to change.

Adventure to Abaddon: Renascence is a sequel to Stairway to Destiny, though it is different enough in which it can be played on its own. It follows Phil, and his adventure through the afterlife where he comes to find out the truth of the universe and fight his way back to life.

THIS GAME CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR RENASCENCE, AS SOME DETAILS FROM THIS DEMO MAY BE IN THE FINAL RELEASE.

PLEASE DO NOT ASK WHEN THE FINAL RELEASE WILL COME OUT, I DO NOT HAVE MUCH DEV TIME SO IT WILL COME OUT WHEN I HAVE ENOUGH TIME.

Note: I am aware there is an audio bug with some of the game's music. I will fix that next alpha release.
